settings.reply-type-lable-helpText: Reply to topic:Join the discussion to view hidden content,Reply to the specified post:Must reply directly to the post containing hidden content
settings.theme-type-parse-lable: Post parsing mode when replying to a topic
settings.theme-type-parse-helpText: Only takes effect when “Reply display options” is set to “Reply to Topic”

reply-type: Reply to topic to reveal hidden content (Default)
Reply to specified post to reveal hidden content
